content: Free Bet Blackjack, is based on the popular variation of Classic Blackjack. The game includes a big added attraction of selected ‘Free Double Down’ and ‘Free Split’ bets.Rules: In Classic Free Bet Blackjack, players get a ‘Free Double Down’ bet on two-card with hard totals of 9,10, or 11. Added to that are ‘Free Split’ bets on all pairs except 10, J, Q and K. What’s more, the free bets are automatically offered to the player whenever their hand qualifies, so there’s no effort required by the player.So far this is my favorite variation of blackjack by evolution gaming since it offers double reward without increasing the original bet. Free bet regular table is what’s the best compared to the infinite version because you can increase your chance on getting free bet on multiple seats.Important Note: If you have free split then 1 hand win and other hand lose; therefore you will just breakeven.  If you have free split then 1 hand tie and other hand lose; therefore you will lose your original bet.  The game is draw if the dealer busted @ 22 count except when your card is Blackjack. Busted card will still busted. comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: I play this type of blackjack on infinite mode. The only thing I hate on this blackjack type was the draw when dealer bust on 22. You should add this info on the thread because this is the major disadvantage of this game in exchange for all those free bets given. However Blackjack can still win even with dealer bust at 22 but the chance for dealer to bust at 22 is very high and really frustrating if you have successful double down and split then deal just bust at 22 to tie the game.This game can makes player more greedy due to potential free bet and frustrated at the same time when draw at bust. The new variation for this blackjack type is good base on the points that you mention but I will still keep away on this Blackjack type because free bet is not frequently happening. The repercussion of bust @ 22 is still painful.

comments.body: Quick Poll:Scenario: Dealer have 10 while you have pair of 5. You have to choose if free split or double down. What will you choose on this situation?Is it free split which will give you 2 chance to have a better hands or just simply double down and aim for a high risk high reward of easy x2 in case you hit Ace or 10 while dealer count is below 20.I experienced many times this hand and I always choosing double down most of the time since its very hard to get a good count when I split pair of 5 but I saw many players splitting it especially those high roller to have a good count on one hand to breakeven since double down that result to bad hit is very risky for them to lose there bet.
